titles.title: Business Travel Incentives Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a 100 percent deduction for meal and entertainment expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/17/2005--Introduced. Business Travel Incentives Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 50% limitation on the tax deduction for meals and entertainment expenses.
